title: Virginia Tech named No. 11 seed in NCAA Tournament - VT hokiesports.com
content:
1. Virginia Tech named No. 11 seed in NCAA Tournament  VT hokiesports.com
  2. Tech Dancing in NCAA Tournament – Women's Basketball — Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets  Georgia Tech
  3. Red Raiders earn fourth straight NCAA Tournament berth - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
  4. Virginia Tech will face Texas in NCAA men's tournament  The Washington Post
  5. Texas Tech earns No. 3 seed, facing Montana State in San Diego  KCBD
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: ACC champions Virginia Tech men's basketball was named a No. 11 seed in the East Region on Sunday evening and will face No. 6 Texas in Milwaukee, Wisconsin on Friday.
